content: **i m unable to offer pattern support for my free patterns via ravelry pm or email - please visit the wormhead s hats group 1 if you have a question about this pattern thanks for your understanding ** 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/3845963/1-25 things with horns the minotaur goats triceratopses rhinoceroses devils jackalopes unicorns and kittens wait not kittens but you get the point all of the most ferocious predators in the animal kingdom come equipped to gore you to death now you too can don horns rip through a crowd and leave nothing but blood and carnage in your wake we are proud to present these hats the finest in evolutionary haberdashery
